info.updatedServerCount: Updated server count. Connected to {SERVER_COUNT} total servers.

error.retrieveShardCount: An error occurred while retrieving the recommended shard count.
error.spawnShard: An error occurred while spawning shards.
error.updateServerCount: An error occurred while updating the server count.
error.updateServerCountSite: An error occurred while updating the server count on '{BOT_SITE}'.
error.login: An error occurred while the client attempted to login.
error.guildJoin: An error occurred while processing a guild join.
error.guildLeave: An error occurred while processing a guild leave.
error.resolveGuild: Guild '{GUILD_ID}' could not be resolved even though it is in the cache.
error.message: An error occurred while processing a message.
error.birthdayJob: An error occurred while running the birthday job.
error.celebrateBirthday: An error occurred while trying to celebrate birthdays for guild '{GUILD_NAME}' ({GUILD_ID}).
error.messagePartial: An error occurred while trying to fetch a message partial.
